Description: Akoya transforms the way people share their data by making it more secure, private, reliable, and transparent.
Full Description: Akoya transforms the way people share their data by making it more secure, private, reliable, and transparent. Akoya replaces screen scraping with application programming interfaces (APIs), enabling individuals to share their data with fintech apps using their financial institution’s existing online portal. This eliminates the need for login information to be held and stored by anyone else. Additionally, Akoya provides a simple way for people to grant, modify, or revoke access to their financial data at any time. Through a single integration with Akoya, financial institutions, fintechs, and data aggregators can enable multiple API connections and avoid continued maintenance and development efforts. Akoya handles all data-sharing relationships on behalf of network participants and removes the myriad of internal and external costs required to develop and manage multiple third-party agreements.   Akoya optimizes for security, transparency, and scalability, and offers a passthrough model that does not copy, store, or hold any financial data or personal information. The network is an interoperable solution available to the entire financial services industry. Akoya was founded in 2018 and is headquartered in Boston, Massachusetts, USA.
Headquarters Regions: Greater Boston Area, East Coast, New England

Description: Crossmint offers APIs for enterprises and developers to build seamless NFT applications at scale
Full Description: Crossmint offers enterprise-grade infrastructure to build seamless NFT use cases at scale. Crossmint powers 15,000+ companies and developers, like Deloitte, airBaltic, Diageo, Red Bull, Manifold, and Magic Eden. The suite of tools includes:  - Minting APIs: create and distribute up to 100k NFTs/hour reliably. Deploy pre-audited smart contracts and create, edit, and burn NFTs on-demand. Airdrop them to wallets or email addresses, creating wallets on-the-fly. - NFT checkout: allow fiat and cross-chain payments for your NFT sales. Crossmint has powered over 4,000 drops and marketplaces with billions of dollars in transaction volume. It enables anyone to purchase NFTs in one minute, from any device, even if they don't have a wallet. For sellers, it's free and takes ~10 minutes to set up. - Wallets-as-a-service: embed whitelabel wallets directly on your site, abstracting the blockchain entirely, and creating interoperable experiences. No passphrases, transaction approval prompts, sponsor gas; compliant globally and with best-in-class MPC security.

Description: Personalized Guide for Entrepreneurs Building a Better Future
Full Description: Entrepreneurship is like going through life left handed. Everything is harder than it should be. Outside the Silicon Valley bubble, this is even more true. You have to piece together all the resources yourself. Even if you have relationships to guide you, the result is one size fits all solutions that may not be best for your business. At the same time, the need for support for startups is growing drastically as people realized they can work remotely and start a business from home. Or they move to start a business outside of the big expensive cities. The result, is a startup support gap. The startup support gap means startups are fighting gravity just to make it. Current solutions aren't equipped to handle the startup support gap. We have accepted that 90% of businesses fail and there's nothing we can do about it. So the startup support gap lives on terrorizing anyone with the courage to take on the status quo. Until now...

Full Description: Stable Credit - Anytime, Anywhere! OpenEXA Inc.  Bridging Wall Street assets to the crypto markets - Credit, onramp and infrastructure for Wall Street fund managers. OpenEXA helps fund managers increase total portfolio returns by leveraging traditional assets in the crypto markets. It borrows economic trust from Wall Street and transforms it into decentralized trust on the blockchain to issue stable credit. Cryptocurrency embodies a compelling combination of high returns, low correlation and exceptional liquidity - the magic trinity of finance. Despite its undeniable potential to generate alpha, many institutional investors remain on the sidelines, reluctant to enter the market. However, the introduction of credit has the capacity to revolutionize and change this landscape.  Credit is the largest part of the economy, and it's a form of trust, and trust can be borrowed on the blockchain. By making credit available on-chain, fund managers on Wall Street can increase total portfolio returns. Transforming Economic Trust: How? Unveiling the 700 T$ Journey from Wall Street Assets to on-chain Credit!

Description: Certified Cell provides consignment cell phone inventory to retail partners.
Full Description: Certified Cell provides consignment pre-owned cell phone inventory to retailers across the US. Through a diverse inventory acquisition strategy, Certified Cell allows retailers to offer a robust selection of pre-owned cell phone inventory to their customers at competitive prices without having to come out of pocket upfront to carry the selection. As is the case in many brick-and-mortar retail industries, margins are tight for wireless retailers and wireless repair shops, which makes it difficult for those stores to have the excess money available to carry a pre-owned phone inventory. This creates an enormous divide between the total solution they can offer their customer and what their customer needs because there is no better captive audience for a pre-owned phone than someone who just found out their phone is broken beyond repair. One of Certified Cell's device acquisition methods is called Mobilize for Good. Mobilize for Good helps nonprofit organizations generate revenue while eliminating local eWaste by enabling the nonprofit to collect preowned cell phones from their supporters which are turned into cash by Mobilize for Good.

Description: The Comprehensive Luxury and Exotic Car Experience - Buy. Sell. Consign. Maintain.
Full Description: We’re modernizing the world of used premium vehicles. Motorenn is a Los Angeles-based startup leading the evolution of the entire luxury and exotic car ownership experience. Our customers can buy, sell, cosign, and maintain their vehicles with Motorenn via our online or app interface as a one stop full lifecycle service. We are automotive enthusiasts focused on transforming the high-end car experience. We want our customers to experience the same joy and awe that we have for these modern engineering marvels, rather than worrying about haggling or wasting hours showroom and stressful back and forth scheduling for maintenance! From our careful vehicle selection, innovative data-driven pricing, and investment in our best-in-class digital capabilities, we are trailblazing a new e-commerce model in order to share that experience with customers throughout the country. Trust, value, and efficiency are at the core of what drives us. Our vehicles, which undergo an exhaustive 151-point inspection, will never have salvage titles, frame damage, airbag deployment, or damage to more than two external panels. Our digital consignment process is as effortless as it gets when it comes selling a $100k+ vehicle. Our algorithmic pricing model takes into consideration condition, mileage, and options to provide a single transparent, no-haggle prices with no hidden fees. Our digitally streamlined retail experience means that customers never even have to step foot into our showroom! And finally, our full service maintenance capabilities mean customers never have to stress about their ownership experience.

The company was founded with the aim of providing high-quality, healthy, and flavorful products to enhance the taste of meals while promoting a healthy lifestyle. The company's products are made from premium, certified organic and non-GMO ingredients that are sourced from trusted farmers around the world. The product line of Spicy Organic includes a range of spices and herbs, such as basil, oregano, garlic, ginger, turmeric, cumin, and black pepper, among others. The company's seasoning blends are also very popular, including taco seasoning, Mediterranean seasoning, and curry powder. Each product is carefully crafted and blended to perfection to ensure that it meets the highest standards of quality and taste. Spicy Organic is committed to producing healthy and environmentally sustainable products. The company uses only natural and organic ingredients that are free from any harmful additives or preservatives. Spicy Organic also operates with minimal waste and promotes eco-friendly practices throughout the supply chain. The company's products have gained a strong reputation for their exceptional quality and taste. Spicy Organic's customers include individuals, restaurants, and food manufacturers who seek to elevate the taste of their meals while staying true to their health and wellness goals. In addition to its core product line, Spicy Organic is also committed to giving back to the community. The company has partnered with local organizations to donate a portion of its profits to support various causes, such as education and healthcare. With a commitment to quality, sustainability, and community involvement, Spicy Organic is poised for continued growth and success in the spice and seasoning market.

Description: LumaFlo provides the most advanced air decontamination technology on the planet.
Full Description: Covid isn’t the first pandemic we’ve faced and it won’t be the last. Covid is here to stay, along with its ever-mutating variants and plethora of yet-to-be-identified viruses and pathogens. In order to meet the demands of a rapidly growing population and ever-changing health risks, the world must move beyond traditional air filtration and UV solutions. LumaFlo’s proprietary material naturally intercepts bacteria from the air, neutralizing it and rendering it harmless. Composed of a specially activated carbon and metal oxide, the photocatalytic material activates when exposed to any form of artificial (i.e. regular daylight LED) or natural (i.e. sunlight) light. As airflow brings bacteria into the vicinity of LumaFlo, the activated carbon nanotechnology triggers a chain reaction that safely decomposes airborne organic molecules and organisms that pass nearby. With no need for an independent power supply, complex installation or harmful UV light, LumaFlo is the most effective, efficient and safe air decontamination solution in existence.
Headquarters Regions: Greater Detroit Area, Great Lakes, Midwestern US

Description: DOCGuard is a cybersecurity solution that provides fastest, in-depth file analyses and IOCs extraction. DOCGuard is located in Virginia.
Full Description: DOCGuard is a malware analysis service that performs a new kind of static analysis called structural analysis.  The structural analysis dissembles the malware and passes it to the core engines with respect to its components. With the aid of this approach, DOCGuard can precisely detect malicious documents and extract the F/P free IOCs from the documents and may also identify obfuscation and encryption in the form of string encoding and document encryption.   The detailed findings of the structural analysis are presented in an aggregated view in the GUI and can be downloaded as a JSON report and can also be gathered over API.  DOCGuard’s main use case is to integrate with SEGs (Secure Email Gateways) and SOAR solutions.
Headquarters Regions: Greater Philadelphia Area, East Coast, Southern US

Description: Meru Biotechnologies develops a compensated backscattering interferometry solution for understanding and measuring molecular binding.
Full Description: Meru Biotechnologies develops a compensated backscattering interferometry solution for understanding and measuring molecular binding. The Compensated Back Scattering Interferometry (CBSI) is a label-free and free solution assay technology for measuring molecular interaction. The study of proteins often involves immobilization, labeling, fractionation, and removal from the native environment depriving them of substances needed to function properly. CBSI quantifies the interaction of molecules in solution without labeling, immobilization, tethering, or special impedance plates. The company was founded in 2019 and is headquartered in Richmond, Virginia.

Description: qChange uses its SaaS solution to capture real-time leadership signals at scale using collaboration tools.
Full Description: qChange developed a leadership grade that is portable, peer verified, and immutable for the lifetime of the leader. Currently, there is no easy method to grow and promote a leader’s soft skills throughout the lifetime of their career leaving HR and their partners in the dark on the impact of their development initiatives. qChange's Leadership Experience is a SaaS solution that is embedded inside Microsoft Teams. CURRENT PRODUCT The Behavior360® Platform is the only continuous, real-time solution that strengthens manager & team relationships, increases employee engagement, and provides HR with real-time signals of program impact. The qChange Leader Experience solution includes over 45 behavioral areas, 900 unique nudges & 800 nano-learnings. It also includes an industry-first, real-time leader score. This results in a real-time portable leader score on the blockchain. TARGET MARKET qChange's initial SOM is 3,000 US companies with >500 employees in knowledge worker industries. We are focused on partner channels (e.g., coaching companies, leadership development) for the initial beachhead. The initial market is 1M mgr./users for a SOM of $389M. Target companies desire real-time signals on program impact, an inclusive & feedback-driven culture and in-the-flow leadership development that maximizes their content. BUSINESS MODEL Leader Experience is an 80% margin business, SaaS-based business utilizing: 1) a partner channel with Coaching and leadership development companies that already sell to large organizations. $350/leader/yr. ASP. 2) a direct B2B channel, selling individual and corporate licenses for $500/leader/yr. to companies w/500-2,000 employees. Added services include custom leadership frameworks and company culture program implementation. COMPETITIVE ADVANTAGE There are three distinct competitive advantages for qChange. 1) Patents pending Leader Experience cycle, that includes real-time prompts, feedback, and measurement of leader growth. 2) First-mover advantage by focusing on soft skills in meetings, integrated with Microsoft Teams. 3) The Behavior360® Platform measures the real-time impact of leadership initiatives. 4) Industry-first portable leader score.
Headquarters Regions: West Coast, Western US

Description: Video Streaming Content Delivery Interface
Full Description: Currently, when video content is presented, one production angle is given at a time. The viewer has no control of what camera viewpoint is being shown. Snipitz provides a Content Delivery Interface™ (CDI) that interrupts traditional, one-view broadcasting. This CDI allows viewers to cultivate their own viewing experience, providing engagement at every moment. Simply put, imagine the ability to watch a golf game and have access to all cameras that are available on the course. You can then chose to watch the players and action of your choice as the game plays out. In addition to viewer choice, the Snipitz Interface allows for the broadcast of both live and pre-recorded events. Within the CDI, the viewer can be given the ability to 'Snipz' a short form video clip to share on their social media. Multiple advertising streams are built into the backend for Snipitz broadcasting partners as well as valuable analytic tools.

The platform offers students a transparent and personalized college application experience. Founded by 2 Cambridge MBA students with a mission to democratize the college planning and application process. On Mocaa, students can browse advisors, schedule initial meetings, and access videos at no platform cost. When a service is booked, Mocaa acts as an escrow to withhold the money until the advisor fulfills the service. Students' personal profiles are confidential and protected from public access; only verified advisors have access to the profiles. All advisor users must go through the verification process in order to start their business on Mocaa. Verified advisors may browse student profiles and initiate conversations. Services and pricing are personalized on advisor profiles, giving advisors the ultimate control of their business. Advisors can also post free case studies on Mocaa as a powerful advertising tool to demonstrate their records of success and strategies to attract public viewers.

Description: Lookin develops terahertz scanners for high-throughput and high-sensitivity material characterization and quality control.
Full Description: Terahertz waves can penetrate through many optically opaque materials, allowing us to see inside many environments that are visually inaccessible. In addition, most molecules have unique spectral signatures at terahertz frequencies, enabling us to identify them under terahertz illumination. Furthermore, terahertz waves are non-ionizing and non-destructive and, therefore, do not pose a health risk. The combination of these attractive specifications, provides a unique platform for many non-destructive quality control applications. Lookin develops scanners utilizing terahertz waves for various quality control applications where high-throughput and high-sensitivity operation is needed.

Description: Low-code, visual drag n drop SaaS platform for developers, making Kubernetes application development easy, painless and fast.
Full Description: CloudPlex platform is the next generation, low-code, visual drag n drop SaaS platform for developers, making Kubernetes application development easy, painless and fast. We are changing the way developers create, test, debug and deploy Kubernetes applications. Just like smart IDEs have become a standard developer’s tool, we envision smart visual tools becoming standard for developers to build Kubernetes applications. CloudPlex presents a smart visual drag-n-drop interface that hides all the complexity of the underlying technologies, and fully automates the development lifecycle – from designing, to building, to debugging, to deployment and management of Kubernetes applications. With CloudPlex, developers never have to manually create YAML or Helm - the platform automatically generates all required artifacts. CloudPlex enables remote development from IDEs to dev clusters. There is n​o need to repeatedly push, build, and deploy code​ to a Kubernetes cluster. CloudPlex makes collaborative integration testing easy and painless by providing a set of ​diagnostic, debug and troubleshooting dashboards. The CloudPlex K​ubernetes-ready Service Hub enables r​eusability of services to speed up application delivery​. Developers can choose from 1300+ services and add them in seconds, through a visual interface CloudPlex platform cuts down the development and debugging time by 50%, and reduces errors by half. It reduces the level of Kubernetes skill set required to build cloud native applications, and allows existing developers without Kubernetes expertise to become productive without extensive training. CloudPlex reduces enterprise’s dependence on deep expertise in Kubernetes to win in the marketplace.
Headquarters Regions: Greater Seattle Area, West Coast, Western US

Description: Cross-border commerce solutions for Africa.
Full Description: Klasha is a technology company that powers African payments for global companies to sell cross-border online to and from Africa. We’ve built payables and receivables solutions for businesses and consumers that allow frictionless money movement between Africa and the rest of the world. Using Klasha, global businesses can accept payments from Africa in many African money methods and currencies, send cross-border payments on our platform, and get paid in hard currencies. Ultimately, we enable global businesses to scale into Africa frictionlessly through our technology and, in turn, allow African consumers to access global goods and services using the African currencies and money methods they possess. Klasha is currently in Nigeria, Tanzania, Uganda, South Africa, Kenya, and Zambia. Klasha is backed by leading venture investors, including Amex Ventures, Greycroft (investors in Braintree and Venmo), Seedcamp (investors in Revolut), Techstars (investors in Remitly), and Plug and Play (investors in Paypal, Honey, and Dropbox).

Full Description: Usually, it takes 4-8 hours every sprint for developers to convert a design into code. Often this work is tedious and repetitive, and much more importantly, prone to bugs and issues. A lot of back-and-forth happens between designers and developers during this process. This back-and-forth slows product momentum and can cause massive company losses. It happened to us at our previous company Orai and it happens every day to teams across the globe; big and small. So we built CopyCat to help teams build UI up to 80% faster using AI-powered code generation. Description: Words, first scope for examination of abdominal cavity
Full Description: OUI Medical Inc. Overview: OUI Medical Inc. is an innovative medical device company established in 2021 with a mission to revolutionize abdominal cavity examination methods.It specializes in the development, manufacturing, and distribution of groundbreaking medical devices, primarily focusing on their flagship product, the P-Scope. Key Product: The P-Scope is a state-of-the-art medical device designed for non-invasive, cost-effective, and efficient examination of the abdominal cavity. This device stands out for its ability to perform diagnostic procedures using local anesthesia in an outpatient setting, offering a convenient alternative to traditional laparoscopy and laparotomy methods. Target Markets: OUI Medical targets global secondary and tertiary level hospitals, catering to various specialties including gastroenterologists, GI surgeons, oncologists, gynecologists, and emergency care specialists. Business Strategy: The company's strategy revolves around leveraging its disruptive technology to partner with large OEMs for global marketing and distribution. This approach aims to quickly penetrate the market and establish the P-Scope as a standard tool in medical diagnostics and patient care. Financials: OUI Medical has been initially funded through self-investment and support from the Health Wildcatters med-tech accelerator. The company is actively seeking further investment to support regulatory clearance, product development, and market entry in the USA, EU, and Asia. Goals: OUI Medical's goal is to sell 500,000 units of the P-Scope at an average price of $2,000 each, targeting revenue generation of $1 billion within the next five years. The company is also committed to improving healthcare outcomes by reducing the need for invasive procedures and making advanced medical technology more accessible and affordable.
Headquarters Regions: Dallas/Fort Worth Metroplex, Southern US

Description: Helping every student find their passion, people, and place in higher education.
Full Description: Despite being the multi-billion dollar gateway to a trillion dollar industry, have you ever heard someone say, "College admissions is a really great process"?  Neither have we and the failures of this antiquated, largely analog system drive cost and pain to both schools and students alike.  With unprecedented pressure on schools today from declining population, rising costs, and increased competition from online alternatives, not to mention Covid, the time has come to disrupt and improve this system with technology.  That's Troove.   Troove shifts the admissions focus from enrollment to graduation, using AI to model the social and academic success markers of every school by engaging the people who have already found the success coveted by every incoming freshman -- the alumni.  Alumni hold the success code for their schools and Troove has created the platform and process to quickly and cost effectively define that code so schools can better assess lasting academic and social fit, admitting the students most likely to graduate, not just enroll.   And by concurrently building a large, diverse, global market of applicants, Troove can then filter that entire pool against the unique success code of every school, finding compelling matches for students and schools alike that were never previously possible.  Troove's applicant pool is far larger than any one school can achieve on its own, increasing access and diversity, and breaking down the geographic barriers experienced by the 97% of schools that fall outside the top tier.  This fundamentally shifts the admissions process from generating as many applications as possible to engaging with highly qualified candidates who understand their fit. This drives cost and process efficiencies across the school value chain as more students come, learn, graduate, and remain engaged for a lifetime with their schools.  Better inputs lead to better outputs and by connecting the two largest communities within every school -- the alumni and the applicants -- Troove radically improves outcomes and value for students and schools alike.
Headquarters Regions: New England, Northeastern US
